about_the_game:
Save Your Girlfriend From The Mansion

Your girlfriend has disappeared into the MANOR FOR THE FOREVER TORMENTED, a mansion swallowed by a demon named ToruTaru who is building an army of traumatized spirits to fight God.
Find her and escape.

Randomly Generated Horror Experience

  • Procedural AI-generated infinitely randomized levels, enemies, and items make for a new play experience every time.
  • Chilling horror experience tracks down, stalks, haunts, and torments the player personally
  • Use 9 different talismans to fight ghosts, skip floors, or warp through walls
  • Dozens of spirit behavior types and appearances haunt you as you ascend the infinite mansion
  • Create a map as you explore and draw on it freely to make notes
  • Help various people you encounter as you climb the mansion
  • Climb to the highest floor you can and build your rank as a ToruTaru explorer

Early Access

  • Be a part of the terrifying and addictive early beta while the developer adds new types of levels, enemies, questgivers, talismans, and other features
  • Early access purchases carry over to the full version - get it while it's cheap

content_descriptors.notes: ToruTaru contains themes involving hauntings, suicide, death, and some mild language.

short_description: Delve into the infinitely AI-generated, ghastly haunted mansion of TORUTARU. Use talismans, maps, your wits, and the friends you make along the way to fight off the angered spirits and survive. Every playthrough is a unique experience.
